description: To protect yourself, avoid these situations...
title: How Can I get HIV?
content:
You can become infected in any of the following ways:
 - By having unprotected sex with an infected person. 
 - By sharing drug needles with an infected person.
 - An infected mother can transmit or pass the virus to her baby during pregnancy or at birth.  
 - The baby can also become infected through breastfeeding.
